column4: Anyone know if there's any program I can use newsgroups on? Like I could on Outlook Express on Windows?
Would USB sound work on Ubuntu ???
there are several, personally I would use thunderbird http://www.mozilla.org/support/thunderbird/faq <-- will tell you how to if you need that level of help
about 6 people are now telling you things I guess you should scroll back a little and calm down

The part where someone told me not to say "wtf" or the part where someone told me to change my batteries which are full or the part where someone is telling me my mouse is broken when it's perfectly fine.
all of the above - something in there might be useful or not as the case may be
